TestCase.name: testMultiLevelViews
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[LIKE($2, _UTF-16LE'%hello%')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[b, cnt]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b, cnt]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($0, 4)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], cnt=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b, a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[LIKE($2, _UTF-16LE'%hello%')]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[LIKE($2, _UTF-16LE'%world%')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink3], fields=[b, cnt]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b, cnt]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>=($0, 4), <($0, 6))]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], cnt=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[b, a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[LIKE($2, _UTF-16LE'%hello%')]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[LIKE($2, _UTF-16LE'%world%')]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])(reuse_id=[2])
Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[LIKE(c, '%hello%')])(reuse_id=[1]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[b], select=[b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS cnt])(reuse_id=[3]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, Partial_COUNT(a) AS count$0]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[b, a]) :- Calc(select=[b, a]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Calc(select=[b, a], where=[LIKE(c, '%world%')]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[b, cnt]) +- Calc(select=[b, cnt], where=[(b < 4)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[3])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink3], fields=[b, cnt]) +- Calc(select=[b, cnt], where=[SEARCH(b, Sarg[[4..6)])]) +- Reused(reference_id=[3])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinks1
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_sum=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[sum_a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[sum_a, c]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], sum_a=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[c, a]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_min=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[sum_a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[sum_a, c]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], sum_a=[SUM($1)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[c, a]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[sum_a])(reuse_id=[1]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[c], select=[c, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS sum_a]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[c, a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS total_sum]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(sum_a) AS sum$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_MIN(min$0) AS total_min]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_MIN(sum_a) AS min$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinks2
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a1, b1]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, $0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a1, b1]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, $0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(a <= 10)])(reuse_id=[1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])
Union(all=[true], union=[a, b])(reuse_id=[2]) :- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Calc(select=[a0 AS a, b AS b1]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a0 = a)], select=[a, b, a0], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a, b]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinks3
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, $0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a1, b1]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, $0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(a <= 10)])(reuse_id=[1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])
Calc(select=[a0 AS a, b AS b1])(reuse_id=[2]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a0 = a)], select=[a, b, a0], build=[right]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, b1]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a, b]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a, b]) :- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinks4
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a1, b, c2]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b, c2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $2)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($1, 5)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($0, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a1, b, c1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b, c1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, $0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a3, c1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($1, 5)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($0, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b, c2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $2)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($1, 5)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($0, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])(reuse_id=[1])
Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[(a >= 0)])(reuse_id=[2]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Calc(select=[a AS a1, b, c AS c2])(reuse_id=[3]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = a2)], select=[a, b, a2, c], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(a <= 10)]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a AS a2, c], where=[(b >= 5)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a1, b, c2]) +- Reused(reference_id=[3])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a1, b, c1]) +- Calc(select=[a1, b, c1]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a1 = a3)], select=[a3, c1, a1, b], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a3]]) : +- Calc(select=[a AS a3, c AS c1], where=[(b < 5)]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[2]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a1]]) +- Calc(select=[a1, b]) +- Reused(reference_id=[3])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinks5
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_sum=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalProject(a=[random_udf($0)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_min=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalProject(a=[random_udf($0)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[random_udf(a) AS a])(reuse_id=[1]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS total_sum]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_MIN(min$0) AS total_min]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_MIN(a) AS min$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksSplitOnUnion1
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_sum=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_min=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a])(reuse_id=[1]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- Calc(select=[a, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[d AS a]) +- Calc(select=[d, f]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]], fields=[d, e, f])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS total_sum]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_MIN(min$0) AS total_min]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_MIN(a) AS min$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksSplitOnUnion2
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_sum=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_min=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink3], fields=[a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a])(reuse_id=[2]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- Calc(select=[a, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[d AS a]) +- Calc(select=[d, f]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]], fields=[d, e, f])
Union(all=[true], union=[a])(reuse_id=[1]) :- Reused(reference_id=[2]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS total_sum]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_MIN(min$0) AS total_min]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_MIN(a) AS min$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink3], fields=[a]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksSplitOnUnion3
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, c]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_sum=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink3], fields=[total_min]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_min=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a, c])(reuse_id=[1]) :- Calc(select=[a, c]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[d, f]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]], fields=[d, e, f])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, c]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Union(all=[true], union=[a])(reuse_id=[2]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_sum]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS total_sum]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink3], fields=[total_min]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_MIN(min$0) AS total_min]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_MIN(a) AS min$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[2])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksSplitOnUnion4
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_sum=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_min=[MIN($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Union(all=[true], union=[a])(reuse_id=[1]) :- Union(all=[true], union=[a]) : :- Calc(select=[a]) : : +- Calc(select=[a, c]) : : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c]) : +- Calc(select=[d AS a]) : +- Calc(select=[d, f]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]], fields=[d, e, f]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- Calc(select=[a, c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[total_sum]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS total_sum]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[total_min]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_MIN(min$0) AS total_min]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_MIN(a) AS min$0]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksWithUDTF
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, total_c]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, total_c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($0, 50)]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, total_c]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], total_c=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<>($2, _UTF-16LE'')]) : +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{2}]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a]))], c=[$2]) : : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($1, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(_UTF-16LE'${startTime}'))]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[split($cor0.c)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) EXPR$0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]))], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($1, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(_UTF-16LE'${startTime}'))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a, total_c]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, total_c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($0, 50)]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, total_c]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], total_c=[COUNT(DISTINCT $2)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<>($2, _UTF-16LE'')]) : +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{2}]) : :- LogicalProject(select=[a]))], c=[$2]) : : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($1, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(_UTF-16LE'${startTime}'))]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[split($cor0.c)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) EXPR$0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]))], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($1, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(_UTF-16LE'${startTime}'))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])(reuse_id=[1])
Calc(select=[a, total_c])(reuse_id=[2]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS total_c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, Partial_COUNT(c) AS count$0]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a, b, c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, EXPR$0 AS c]) +- Correlate(invocation=[split($cor0.c)], correlate=[table(split($cor0.c))], select=[a,b,c,EXPR$0], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, VARCHAR(2147483647) c, VARCHAR(2147483647) EXPR$0)], joinType=[INNER]) +- Calc(select=[a, (b - MOD(b, 300)) AS b, c], where=[((b >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('${startTime}')) AND (c <> ''))]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Calc(select=[a, 0 AS total_c], where=[(b >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('${startTime}'))])(reuse_id=[3]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, total_c]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a, total_c]) :- Calc(select=[a, total_c], where=[(a > 50)]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[2]) +- Calc(select=[a, CAST(total_c AS BIGINT) AS total_c], where=[(a > 50)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[3])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a, total_c]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a, total_c]) :- Calc(select=[a, total_c], where=[(a < 50)]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[2]) +- Calc(select=[a, CAST(total_c AS BIGINT) AS total_c], where=[(a < 50)]) +- Reused(reference_id=[3])

TestCase.name: testMultiSinksWithWindow
TestCase.Resource:
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, sum_c, time, window_start, window_end]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, sum_c])], window_start=[TUMBLE_START($0)], window_end=[TUMBLE_END($0)]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], sum_c=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[$TUMBLE($3, 15000:INTERVAL SECOND)], a=[$0], $f2=[CAST($2):DOUBLE]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])
LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a, sum_c, time]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, sum_c])]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0, 1}], sum_c=[SUM($2)]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[$TUMBLE($3, 15000:INTERVAL SECOND)], a=[$0], $f2=[CAST($2):DOUBLE]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

HashWindowAggregate(groupBy=[a], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w$, ts, 15000)], properties=[w$start, w$end, w$rowtime], select=[a, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS sum_c])(reuse_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- LocalHashWindowAggregate(groupBy=[a], window=[TumblingGroupWindow('w$, ts, 15000)], properties=[w$start, w$end, w$rowtime], select=[a, Partial_SUM(c) AS sum$0]) +- Calc(select=[ts, a, CAST(c AS DOUBLE) AS c]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c, ts])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink1], fields=[a, sum_c, time, window_start, window_end]) +- Calc(select=[a, sum_c, w$end AS time, w$start AS window_start, w$end AS window_end]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])
Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink2], fields=[a, sum_c, time]) +- Calc(select=[a, sum_c, w$end AS time]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testSingleSink1
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.appendSink], fields=[c, cnt]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], cnt=[COUNT($1)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[c, a]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.appendSink], fields=[c, cnt]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[c], select=[c, Final_COUNT(count$0) AS cnt]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[c]]) +- LocalHashAggregate(groupBy=[c], select=[c, Partial_COUNT(a) AS count$0]) +- Calc(select=[c, a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testSingleSink2
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.appendSink], fields=[a1, b, c1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b, c1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, $0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a3, c1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($1, 5)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($0, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b, c2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $2)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($1, 5)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($0, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.appendSink], fields=[a1, b, c1]) +- Calc(select=[a1, b, c1]) +- MultipleInput(readOrder=[2,1,0], members=[
HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a1 = a3)], select=[a3, c1, a1, b], build=[right])
:- [#1] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a3]])
+- Calc(select=[a AS a1, b])
 +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = a2)], select=[a, b, a2], build=[right])
 :- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
 +- [#3] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]])
]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a3]]) : +- Calc(select=[a AS a3, c AS c1], where=[((a >= 0) AND (b < 5))]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])(reuse_id=[1]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(a <= 10)]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a AS a2], where=[((a >= 0) AND (b >= 5))]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testSingleSink3
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.appendSink], fields=[a1, b1]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, $0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.appendSink], fields=[a, b]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a, b]) :- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(a <= 10)])(reuse_id=[1]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[a0 AS a, b AS b1]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a0 = a)], select=[a, b, a0], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) +- Calc(select=[a]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[a, b, c, d, e])

TestCase.name: testSingleSink4
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a1, b1, c1]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b1, c1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $2)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a3, b1, c1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($2, $0)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a3, c1]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<($1, 5)]) : +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($0, 0)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b, c2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $2)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a1, b]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($0, 10)]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a2, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($1, 5)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=($0, 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a1, b1, c1]) +- Calc(select=[a AS a1, b1, c1]) +- MultipleInput(readOrder=[3,2,1,0], members=[
HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = a3)], select=[a, a3, b1, c1], build=[right])
:- [#1] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
+- Calc(select=[a3, b AS b1, c1])
 +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a1 = a3)], select=[a3, c1, a1, b], build=[right])
 :- [#2] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a3]])
 +- Calc(select=[a AS a1, b])
 +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = a2)], select=[a, b, a2], build=[right])
 :- [#3] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]])
 +- [#4] Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]])
]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a], where=[(a <= 10)]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])(reuse_id=[1]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a3]]) : +- Calc(select=[a AS a3, c AS c1], where=[((a >= 0) AND (b < 5))]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(a <= 10)]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[1]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a2]]) +- Calc(select=[a AS a2], where=[((a >= 0) AND (b >= 5))]) +- Reused(reference_id=[1])

TestCase.name: testSingleSinkSplitOnUnion
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[total_sum]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], total_sum=[SUM($0)]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a]) +- LogicalUnion(all=[true]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, c]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) +- LogicalProject(select=[d, f]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[total_sum]) +- HashAggregate(isMerge=[true], select=[Final_SUM(sum$0) AS total_sum]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single]) +- LocalHashAggregate(select=[Partial_SUM(a) AS sum$0]) +- Union(all=[true], union=[a]) :- Calc(select=[a]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Calc(select=[d AS a]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]], fields=[d, e, f])

TestCase.name: testSingleSinkWithUDTF
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a, b, c, d, e, f, i, j, k, l, m, s]) +- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e, f, i, j, k, l, m, s]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{2}]) :- LogicalProject(select=[a, b, c, d, e, f, i, j, k, l, m]) : +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($1, $4), =($0, $6))]) : +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) : : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]]) : : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[split($cor0.c)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(2147483647) EXPR$0)])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.sink], fields=[a, b, c, d, e, f, i, j, k, l, m, EXPR$0]) +- Correlate(invocation=[split($cor0.c)], correlate=[table(split($cor0.c))], select=[a,b,c,d,e,f,i,j,k,l,m,EXPR$0], rowType=[RecordType(INTEGER a, BIGINT b, VARCHAR(2147483647) c, INTEGER d, BIGINT e, VARCHAR(2147483647) f, INTEGER i, BIGINT j, INTEGER k, VARCHAR(2147483647) l, BIGINT m, VARCHAR(2147483647) EXPR$0)], joinType=[INNER]) +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(a = i)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f, i, j, k, l, m], build=[left]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) : +- HashJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[(b = e)], select=[a, b, c, d, e, f], build=[left]) : :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[e]]) : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1]], fields=[d, e, f]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[i]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2]], fields=[i, j, k, l, m])
